mapper.select: SELECT T1.BOARD_SEQ /*게시글일련번호*/ , T1.TITLE /*제목*/ , T1.INTRO /*소개*/ , T1.CN /*상세내용*/ , T1.USE_YN /*사용여부*/ , T1.FST_REG_ID /*최초등록자아이디*/ , DATE_FORMAT(T1.FST_REG_DTTI, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i") FST_REG_DTTI /*최초등록일시*/ , T1.LT_UPD_ID /*최종수정자아이디*/ , DATE_FORMAT(T1.LT_UPD_DTTI, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i") LT_UPD_DTTI /*최종수정일시*/ FROM TB_PLAY T1 /*테이블_놀이*/ WHERE T1.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY T1.FST_REG_DTTI DESC LIMIT 0, 3
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_PLAY /*테이블_놀이*/ SET TITLE = #{title} /*자유게시판제목*/ , INTRO = #{intro} /*소개*/ , CN = #{cn} /*자유게시판내용*/ , LT_UPD_ID = #{loginInfo.userId} /*최종수정자ID*/ , LT_UPD_DTTI = NOW() /*최종수정일시*/ WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq} /*게시글일련번호*/
UPDATE TB_PLAY /*테이블_놀이*/ SET USE_YN = 'N' /*사용여부*/ , LT_UPD_ID = #{loginInfo.userId} /*최종수정자ID*/ , LT_UPD_DTTI = NOW() /*최종수정일시*/ WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq} /*게시글일련번호*/
